name:
I’m twelve episodes into Succession and I still hate everyone. Every last one.

But, man, that theme song is an absolute banger.

content.html:
I’m twelve episodes into Succession and I still hate everyone. Every last one.

But, man, that theme song is an absolute banger.

summary: @cleverdevil There’s an album on Spotify (probably elsewhere as well), Succession, Season 1 (Original Series Soundtrack), by Nicholas Britell. It has a few variations that are beautiful as well.

summary: @cleverdevil I finally stopped watching Grantchester because I didn't like a single major character besides Father Leonard and the vicarage housekeeper (and I didn't always like her). There are a few gritty police procedurals with the same effect.
